comments.body:
if there's a "timeout" query parameter, parse it into a duration and shorten the context timeout to that

that is is what the API server sends to the webhook to inform it of the timeout (shorter of the API server request timeout and the configured admission webhook timeout)

what's the QPS/Burst for this client? because this is doing live lookups for pods when updating a namespace, and falling back to live lookups for namespaces not in the cache, client-side throttling here can delay admission requests

because there's no authn/authz before processing an admission request, a pod admission request for a bogus namespace could DOS the client
